title: Opposites Attract
description: Jessica lives a life of luxury, but does so within the confines of a gilded cage...or so it seems. Just once, she wants to be break free and live for herself.When she stumbles upon the country’s most dangerous and infamous criminal the day he’s released from prison, she gets her wish…and a whole lot more.After eight years behind bars, Markus claims he can’t control himself around such an innocent young thing like Jessica and needs to claim her as his own.What she sees as a one-time thing, he sees as a once in a lifetime girl that he’s not going to let get away…no matter how hard she tries.He’s playing for keeps, and as far as he’s concerned she already belongs to him…forever.
author: Lena Little
